replies.body: Hey Riot Gehirn, why is it only every thursday, and maybe not 2 or 3 times a week?
why only thursday? and why limited times
also misspelt gauge:  limited time to guage whether ranked

its limited so that queue times are reduced
that way people will get into games more often
supply and demand
its 5pm aedt thursday rn and its not up
I play it whenever its available its so cool to be able to play in a small squad and it brings something different to the regurlar ranked games :D
why does it have to be every thursday cant we have it more through the week

Hey Brudda
whens syndra getting banned :)
Ap varus is op on this map
Taliyah's a good pick in this gamemode. Thanks Gehirn

This isn't really a sustainable addition as people won't be playing it enough.

And the simple reason why people wont play it enough is that it isnt worthwhile to put time into a game mode that you can only access on a thursday evening

I thought it was Christmas? Not April Fools? 

hah im so funneh

This sounds interesting, but I'm not sure enough people will play it for it to be worth keeping available in the long term.
